title: Using the ecosystem serviceshed concept in conservation planning for more equitable outcomes
content:
Publication date: April 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 66

Author(s): Jean-Olivier Goyette, Poliana Mendes, Jérôme Cimon-Morin, Jérôme Dupras, Stéphanie Pellerin, Alain N. Rousseau, Monique Poulin
